isis.stitle: International® DT 466E, DT 466, 530, 530E, and HT 530 Diesel Engines - Power Cylinders - Install - Install Piston and Connecting Rod Assembly

svcproc.title: Install Piston and Connecting Rod Assembly

step1.para: Start with cylinder 1 piston and rod assembly. Procedure for installing cylinder 2 through 6 piston and rod assemblies are identical.
Turn crankshaft three times. Position cylinder 1 and 6 rod journals at Bottom Dead Center (BDC).
Lubricate cylinder sleeve inner surface with clean engine oil.
Lubricate piston rings on piston and connecting rod assembly 1 with clean engine oil and stagger ring gaps 120° apart.
Install Piston Ring Compressor over the piston rings on piston and connecting rod assembly 1.

Insert piston and connecting rod assembly 1 in cylinder sleeve. Use wooden or plastic handle or tool. Numbers on connecting rod must face away from camshaft while markings on top of piston face toward the camshaft side of the engine.
Guide connecting rod in place on crankshaft.
Repeat this procedure for piston and rod assemblies 6, 2, 5, 3, and 4 until all piston and rod assemblies are installed.
